title: Endpoint Configuration
description: Schema for a single endpoint entry, linking a name to cache and communication configurations.

name.description: Unique name for the endpoint configuration.

cache.description: Path to the cache configuration file.

comm.description: Path to the communication configuration file, or null if no communication is used (e.g., for internal endpoints).

pdu_def_path.description: Optional path to a PDU definition file for name-based resolution.
